    The listener for receiving project or session events.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • onEvent

        public abstract void onEvent(String eventName)
        the procedure of onEvent(String) is in session level if triggered by session events (for example EVENT_SYS_MOBILE_LOGIN), even if it is added in project level.

        if there is a long time task in it, it will NOT block the server thread.

        to get the interval time between shutdown and startup in milliseconds, see ProjectContext.getIntervalMSForRestart().
        if the HAR project need more time to shutdown, please set a bigger value in option pane.

        Note : it will raise unknown error when the startup process start new connection, but the same device is NOT shutdown yet.
        Parameters:
        eventName - one of the following, but not all, so else is potential bug.
        ProjectContext.EVENT_SYS_PROJ_STARTUP, ProjectContext.EVENT_SYS_MOBILE_LOGIN, ProjectContext.EVENT_SYS_MOBILE_BACKGROUND_OR_FOREGROUND, ProjectContext.EVENT_SYS_MOBILE_LOGOUT, ProjectContext.EVENT_SYS_PROJ_SHUTDOWN.
